page.title: 15HOUSING, KIRKBY UNDERWOOD
page.content: The area consists of privately- owned detached and semi-detached houses, farmhouses, cottages,bungalows and council houses. Present house values range from below Â£15000 to over Â£100,000. Most properties have good- sized gardens and garages. The Kirkby Underwood area has forty houses and fourteen bungalows, one of which is unoccupied. There are four large farmhouses and an old Vicarage. Twenty-five of the homes are owner- occupied and approximately 50% have central heating, such as solid fuel, oil, electric or calor gas; there is no natural gas in the area. Some houses also have double glazing. Many homes have a bathroom plus shower and a few have more than one bathrom. Hawthorpe has two cottages and eleven houses, five of which are rented; two are at present unoccupied.
